hero.tagline: Automated trading built to simplify decisions and enforce discipline.
hero.subtitle: is a TradingView strategy developed for systematic, automated trading. It follows predefined rules to analyze the market, execute trades, and manage risk consistently.

note.title: Our philosophy:
note.description: ensure disciplined trading and consistent execution, regardless of market conditions.

content-1.title: Market Structure & Trend Detection
content-1.subtitle: Focused on identifying meaningful opportunities — not constant activity.

item-1.title: Market Analysis
item-1.description: Detects trends and structural market shifts using objective price data.

item-2.title: Adaptive Behavior
item-2.description: Adjusts its logic as market dynamics change over time.

item-3.title: Automated Execution
item-3.description: Trades are executed instantly and consistently based on defined rules.

content-2.title: Risk Management & Protection
content-2.subtitle: Built to protect capital and enforce consistency.

item-1.title: Risk Controls
item-1.description: Integrated safeguards help limit drawdowns and control exposure.

item-2.title: Overtrading Protection
item-2.description: Reduces trading activity during low-quality or unclear market phases.

item-3.title: Configurable Parameters
item-3.description: Risk levels and strategy behavior can be adjusted to individual preferences.

steps.title: Simple by Design
steps.subtitle: The strategy runs directly on TradingView. It continuously analyzes price data, generates trade signals based on predefined rules, and executes positions automatically. Once set up, it operates independently — without manual intervention or constant monitoring.

item-1.title: Data
item-1.subtitle: — Indicator Signal
item-1.description: Market conditions are analyzed by our proprietary indicator. When predefined conditions are met, a trading signal is generated.

item-2.title: Logic
item-2.subtitle: — Signal to Trade
item-2.description: Signals are transmitted via webhook and converted into structured trade instructions. Parameters such as direction, size, and risk settings are automatically validated.

item-3.title: Execution
item-3.subtitle: — Order Placement
item-3.description: Validated trade instructions are executed automatically. Orders are placed instantly, following defined risk and execution parameters.
